title: Plot a PAF file
author: Shaun Jackman
params:
  input_paf:
    label: "Input PAF file"
    value: "map.paf.gz"
    input: text
---

```{r setup, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(forcats)
library(ggplot2)
library(Polychrome)
library(readr)
library(scales)
library(tidyr)

knit_print.data.frame <- function(x, ...) kable(x) %>% paste(collapse = "\n") %>% asis_output
input_paf <- params$input_paf

input_paf
```

# Read the PAF file
```{r read-data}
mapq_threshold <- 0
tlength_threshold <- 100

paf_orig <- read_tsv(input_paf,
	col_names = c(
		"Qname", "Qlength", "Qstart", "Qend",
		"Orientation",
		"Tname", "Tlength", "Tstart", "Tend",
		"Matches", "Length", "Mapq"),
	col_types = "ciiicciiiiii")

paf <- paf_orig %>%
	filter(!startsWith(Qname, "NW_"), Tlength >= tlength_threshold, Mapq >= mapq_threshold) %>%
	mutate(
		Qname = as.character(fct_lump(Qname, n = 25)),
		Index = as.numeric(Tname)) %>%
	filter(Qname != "Other") %>%
	arrange(Tname, Tstart, desc(Matches)) %>%
	distinct(Tname, Tstart, .keep_all = TRUE)
```

# Plot the PAF file
```{r plot-paf, fig.height=6, fig.width=6}
ggplot(paf) +
	aes(xmin = Tstart, xmax = Tend, ymin = Index, ymax = Index + 1, fill = Qname) +
	geom_rect() +
	scale_x_continuous(name = "Position", labels = comma_format()) +
	scale_fill_manual(values = as.vector(alphabet.colors(26)))
```

# Plot the PAF file
```{r plot-pafq, fig.height=6, fig.width=6}
pafq <- paf %>%
	filter(Mapq >= 1) %>%
	mutate(
		Qname = as.numeric(as.character(Qname)),
		Tname = as.character(fct_lump(Tname, n = 25)))

ggplot(pafq) +
	aes(xmin = Qstart, xmax = Qend, ymin = Qname, ymax = Qname + 1, fill = Tname) +
	geom_rect() +
	scale_x_continuous(name = "Position", labels = comma_format()) +
	scale_fill_manual(values = as.vector(alphabet.colors(26)))
```

# Dot plot
```{r plot-pafm, fig.height=6, fig.width=6}
pafm <- paf %>%
	filter(Tlength >= 500, Mapq >= 1) %>%
	mutate(Index = row_number())

boundaries <- pafm %>%
	filter(Tname != lead(Tname))

ggplot(pafm) +
	aes(xmin = Qstart, xmax = Qend, ymin = Index, ymax = Index + 1, fill = Qname) +
	geom_rect() +
	geom_hline(aes(yintercept = Index), data = boundaries) +
	scale_x_continuous(name = "Position", labels = comma_format()) +
	scale_fill_manual(values = as.vector(alphabet.colors(26))) +
	theme_bw()
```

```{r save-plot}
ggsave(paste0(input_paf, ".pdf"))
```
